document.full_text: a judge told n.f.l. owners and players he wanted new proposals next week that would narrow the differences that remained when talks broke off march 11.
document.title: in wake of ruling, possibility of progress in n.f.l. lockout
lines_and_colors: a judge told n.f.l. owners and players he wanted new proposals next week that would narrow the differences that remained when talks broke off march 11.
